job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology or related field.

jd: From: Jitendra Singh, Tek pyramids.inc jitendra.s@tekpyramids.com Reply to: jitendra.s@tekpyramids.com Position: Senior Datastax/Cassandra DBALocation: NORTH CHICAGO, IL (Onsite)Duration: 12 Months+Visa: GC, USCC2C Rate: $65/hrInterview: 2 MS Teams Interviews (1 interview may be on site, that’s why we need local candidates!)Note- LinkedIn and state ID or DL MustONLY CANDIDATES LOCAL TO ILLINOIS OR WISCONSIN!!!Must Have12+ years of experience in IT5+ years of experience in DataStax/Cassandra is a MUST!Proficient in one or more Database Management Systems (e.g. DB2i, DB2 LUW, DataStax, Oracle, SQL Server).Familiar with one or more replication technologies (e.g. DTShare, CDC, SQL Replication, Attunity)Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology or related field.Ability to read a Logical Data Model a plus.Certifications are a PLUS. Best Regards ,Jitendra SinghTechnical Recruiter Email : jitendra.s@tekpyramids.com
